summary: MY CUE SCREEN HAS COMPLETELY SPIDERWEBBED AND IS NO LONGER FUNCTIONING. I CAN BARELY SEE MY BACK UP CAM. I CAN NO LONGER UTILIZE THE VEHICLE HANDS FREE BECAUSE I CANNOT SET UP BLUETOOTH. APPARENTLY THIS IS A WIDE KNOWN ISSUE WITH GM AND WILL NOT BE COVERED TO FIX. WHICH IS ABOUT $2K OUT OF POCKET. THIS CAR IS PARKED IN A GARAGE 100% OF THE TIME AND IS BARELY DROVE 2 MILES PER DAY.
